message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for showing me the product, Alice. I'm interested, but $90 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $75.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice. How about we settle at $70?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $72.
